event_param.trigger_message: You have run into an ambush set up by pirates.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that a new ship entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into a fight between two pirate groups. Sadly they have noticed you.
And they are not going to let you just sit and watch. You are being targeted.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors have detected new ships, pirate ships, fighting each other.

event_param.trigger_message: You have entered an asteroid field.

event_param.broadcast_message: Some asteroids have drifted to a location near you.

event_param.trigger_message: You've stumbled upon some pirates in an asteroid field.

event_param.broadcast_message: Some asteroids have drifted to a location near you.

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into a fight between two pirate groups. Sadly they have noticed you.
And they are not going to let you just sit and watch. You are being targeted.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors have detected new ships, pirate ships, fighting each other.

event_param.trigger_message: You detect a lone Unity guard force ship trying evade pirates in an asteroid belt.
You recieve a message comming from the Unity ship:
We are outnumbered and could really use your help.
We have nothing to pay you with, but whatever our enemies have - you can keep it.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors have detected new ships approaching this sector.

event_param.trigger_message: You detect a trader ship tying to hide from pirates in an asteroid belt.
You recieve 2 messages comming the ships.
The message from the pirates is: - Oh sweet, more loot! You're next pal!
The trader ship's message reads: HEEEEEEEEEEEEEELP!

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors have detected new ships approaching this sector.

event_param.trigger_message: You've stumbled upon a trading caravan.
Immediately you recieve a message from one of the guard ships:
- No shooting in this sector!

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that new ships entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You've stumbled upon a trader ship.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that a trader ship has entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: After arriving to this sector you detect a mobile repair platform.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that a mobile repair platform entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into some pirates harassing a trader.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that new ships entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You found a trading station in this sector.

event_param.broadcast_message: Now where did that trading station appear from?

event_param.trigger_message: You found a trading station in this sector.

event_param.broadcast_message: Now where did that trading station appear from?

event_param.trigger_message: Upon arriving to this sector, you detect some debris floating in space.
Upon arriving to this sector, you detect some debris floating in space.

Upon arriving to this sector, you detect some debris floating in space.
Upon arriving to this sector, you detect some debris floating in space.
Upon arriving to this sector, you detect some debris floating in space.
Looks like you have found a graveyard of ships.
You enter a sector and see a big battle going on.
Looks like there are two pirate clans fighting each other.
They do notice your ship, but seem to ignore it.
Soon you recieve a message from both sides.
If you ignore the rude language of the pirates, the point of the message is the following:
- This is none of your business, get the hell out of here untill we change our minds.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors have detected lots of new ships, pirate ships, fighting each other.

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into a pirate slaver ship. It doesn't look like he's hostile.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that new ships entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into a pirate slaver ship.
They broadcast a message: Haha! More slaves!
Sensors indicate that the pirate ship is charging weapons.

event_param.broadcast_message: Sensors indicate that new ships entered this sector

event_param.trigger_message: You have run into a pirate slaver ship.
They broadcast a message: Haha! More slaves!
WARNING! Intruders detected!
